May 15, 2014 / by Open Data Team / In data portal , open data / 4 commetns

Deprecating Community Area attachment datasets on May 30

We will be deprecating the old Shapefile and KML Community Area datasets on May 30th. Please use the interactive version. You can download the KML and Shapefile formats under the Export button.

Read more

May 15, 2014 / by Open Data Team / In data portal , open data / 4 commetns

Building Permits not updating

The building permits dataset has not successfully updated since May 14. This is an automated dataset and has not succeeded due to an importing error. Our team is looking at the issue, but there is not an ETA, yet.

Read more

May 15, 2014 / by Open Data Team / In Data portal , Open data / 4 commetns

Hello world!
